fields.description: Establishes where the data came from.
Aligns with version of the specification.
Username of user who submitted the file to the IZGW.  If this is a system to system submission then this should be the service account.
This field is used to track back to the source filename/objectid.
The name of the file submitted.
The timestamp of last modified for the file submitted.
Identifies if the message is a CASE message or ELR
Informs the type of ELR messages when message_type = ELR
Informs which jurisdiction is uploading the message
